name: clmacl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c3), c2))

stmt.origin: syl3an1(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c3), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
stmt.pretty: syl3an1(c0 ∈ CMod, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[+]c3)∈ c2, c2 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld))

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c3), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c3), c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[+]c3)∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CMod → c2 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld))
⊣ ((c2 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld)∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[+]c3)∈ c2)
